simsim.core
Class Globals

java.lang.Object
  simsim.core.Globals

public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages global simulation properties. Global properties must be set/initialized/loaded at startup (main method). Global properties are identified by a key, usually a string, whose format points to the module affected.

Author:
SÃ©rgio Duarte (smd@di.fct.unl.pt)

Parameters:

                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
